findings.title: Some of tests provided fail
findings.description: Some of tests which was written by developers and provided to audit failing

findings.title: Centralization / Privilege
findings.description: Some roles with higher privileges like DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE, MINTER_ROLE for BTCMT token and Owner for Staking could modify critical configurations, causing users' funds loss and centralization issues.

findings.title: No event on farm add/remove
findings.description: It is the best practice to emit events on admin actions like adding and removing farms. That will allow users to follow those events and see when some are added or removed.
